No. 441P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. James W. Bryan, Gary L. Beaver, Greensboro, Kimberly Sullivan, Charlotte, for Assurance Co. of America, et al. Daniel Lee Brawley, Wilmington, Theodore B. Smyth, Raleigh, for Wachovia Bank, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of August 2006 by Defendants/Third Party Plaintiffs (Assurance Company of America, et al) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of January 2007."

Justice EDMUNDS recused.
